thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 17 of 235
thread.title: Sondra

author: Sondra
title: Sondra
text:
I absolutely Love shopping on Groupon! I can shop for specific items or just simply browse the offers.
I also love that I don't have to ship gifts to my family from the post office or Fed-ex, I simply buy them on Groupon and ship them to my family out of state without ever having to stand in a line. It's very easy.
I love the prices, so very many good deals!
Way to go Groupon!
